verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Worthy is the Lamb,
The Lamb who was slain
Raised to new life
Now seated in Glory

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: All Glory and Honour and Praise to the Lamb

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
We're gathered into one
By the power of His Spirit
We come to His table
It's a heavenly banquet

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
His banner over us
His banner over us
is Love
